snippet.title: Soccer Story Reveal Trailer (Coming November 29!)
snippet.description:
Get Soccer Story now: http://soccerstorygame.com/

It's time to head out and kick that ball all over the place, solving puzzles and problems that require a good smash with a soccer ball. Along the way, you'll need to best bad guys in 1v1s, compete in a range of different sports (with your soccer ball, of course), and sometimes use your brain just as much as your balls

In a world that has long forgotten The Beautiful Game, can you remind them why soccer is top of the table, and best the most formidable teams, including the local toddlers and a group of sharks?
